title: Project: Ron's Food Finder
description: This first project is a Ron Swanson themed website that generates a quote from the character and provides the user with info about a local steak or breakfast restaurant. It makes use of several third party APIs as well as the Materialize CSS framework.

title: Project: Bubbblr
description: This second project is a project management app. It uses Socket.io and Express to allow users to brainstorm for projects in real time, as well as view a pre-organized outline based off of brainstorm 'bubbles' that were sent in chat.

title: The Fantastic Tech Blog
description: This is a blog that makes use of Express sessions and encryption to allow users to sign in and make blog posts about Tech-related matters. It stores posts using SQL and Sequelize.
